question: Which of the following is the primary objective to bring a Privilege Motion in Indian Parliament?
option1: To raise a matter of urgent public importance
option2: To raise a demand for privilege of the ministers
option3: To raise a matter related to breach of parliamentary privileges
option4: To raise a matter such as impeachment of the President
answer: To raise a matter related to breach of parliamentary privileges
explanation: Privilege motion is concerned with the breach of parliamentary privileges by a minister. It is moved by a member when he feels that a minister has committed a breach of privilege of the House. The sole idea is to censure the concerned minister.
